 2016-01592016-03-24FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Artists' Representatives (GST/HST) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the ARTISTS' REPRESENTATIVES (GST/HST) in order to enable Musicians’ Rights Organization Canada and the artists it represents to use the special Goods and Services Tax/Harmonized Sales Tax simplification rules for artists’ representatives.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0060 Publication Date: 2016-04-20
